summary: The module implements utilities that translate Anthropic model request and response payloads to and from the generic Litellm/OpenAI schema, supporting an experimental pass‑through mode. It handles conversion of messages, tool specifications, streaming delta updates, usage statistics, and finish reason mapping.
business_intent: To allow developers to interact with Anthropic models through Litellm using a unified OpenAI‑compatible interface, simplifying integration and promoting interoperability across AI services.
